title.en: from A Shower of Precious Blessings: A Garland of Supplications to Guru Rinpoche, Embodiment of All Refuge Objects, and to the Three Roots and Lineage Masters

text.en: Emaho—O wonder! In the immaculate dharmadhātu realm,
text.en-trans: emaho, chöying nampar dakpé zhingkham su

text.en: Within the palace of dharmakāya, pure and unborn,
text.en-trans: kyemé chöku dakpé podrang né

text.en: Dharmakāya Samantabhadra: to you I pray!
text.en-trans: chöku kuntuzangpo la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me that I may realize the birthless Dharma body!
text.en-trans: kyemé chöku tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: In the Densely-Ornamented Realm of Akaniṣṭha,
text.en-trans: womin tukpo köpé zhingkham su

text.en: Within the mirror-like palace of immaculate ignorance,
text.en-trans: timuk namdak melong podrang né

text.en: Buddha Vairocana: to you I pray!
text.en-trans: sangye nampar nang dzé la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me that I may realize the utter purity of ignorance!
text.en-trans: timuk namdak tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: In the eastern pure realm of Profound Joy,
text.en-trans: sharchok ngönpar gawé zhingkham su

text.en: Within the emptiness palace of immaculate anger,
text.en-trans: zhedang namdak tongnyi podrang né

text.en: Buddha Vajrasattva: to you I pray!
text.en-trans: sangye dorjé sempa la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me that I may realize the utter purity of anger!
text.en-trans: zhedang namdak tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: In the southern pure realm of Glorious Beauty,
text.en-trans: lhochok palden dzepé zhingkham su

text.en: Within the equality palace of immaculate pride,
text.en-trans: ngagyal namdak nyamnyi podrang né

text.en: Buddha Ratnasambhava: to you I pray!
text.en-trans: sangye rinchen jungden la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me that I may realize the utter purity of pride!
text.en-trans: ngagyal namdak tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: In the western pure realm of Great Bliss,
text.en-trans: nubchok dewachen gyi zhingkham su

text.en: Within the discriminating palace of immaculate desire,
text.en-trans: döchak namdak sortok podrang né

text.en: Buddha Amitābha: to you I pray!
text.en-trans: sangye nangwa tayé la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me that I may realize the utter purity of desire!
text.en-trans: döchak namdak tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: In the northern pure realm of Fulfilled Activity,
text.en-trans: jangchok lerab dzokpé zhingkham su

text.en: Within the all-accomplishing palace of immaculate jealousy,
text.en-trans: trakdok namdak ja drub podrang né

text.en: Buddha Amoghasiddhi: to you I pray!
text.en-trans: sangye dön yö drubpa la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me that I may realize the utter purity of jealousy!
text.en-trans: trakdok namdak tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: Eight male bodhisattvas, thousand buddhas,
text.en-trans: sempa gyé dang sangye tong tsa dang

text.en: Eight female bodhisattvas, and all others
text.en-trans: sem ma gyé sok longku tulkü zhing

text.en: Of the saṃbhogakāya and nirmāṇakāya pure realms—to you I pray!
text.en-trans: sangye changsem nam la solwa deb

text.en: Let my mindstream be blessed and others' mindstreams liberated!
text.en-trans: dak gyü jin lab zhen gyü drolwa dang

text.en: Bless us so enlightened activity spreads throughout the ten directions!
text.en-trans: trinlé chok chur gyepar jingyi lob

text.en: Precious Padmākara, venerable guru who singly embodies
text.en-trans: dü sum deshek tamché chikdü pé

text.en: All sugatas throughout the three times;
text.en-trans: jetsün guru pema rinpoche

text.en: Eight ācāryas and sole mother Lady Tsogyal;
text.en-trans: lobpön gyé dang ma chik tsogyalma

text.en: Lotsawas, paṇḍitas, lord and subjects—to you I pray!
text.en-trans: lo pen jebang nam la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me that by perfecting generation and completion,
text.en-trans: kyedzok tarchin tsalung ngöngyur né

text.en: And actualizing the subtle channels and winds,
text.en-trans: chimé tsé yi ngödrub tob né su

text.en: I attain the siddhi of immortality and accomplish rainbow body in this very life!
text.en-trans: tsé dir jalü drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: Succession of Dharma kings, major and minor tertöns,
text.en-trans: chögyal rim jön terchen tertren dang

text.en: Vidyādhara gurus of the Scriptural and Treasure Lineages,
text.en-trans: kater gyüpé lama rigdzin sok

text.en: All gurus of all traditions of India and Tibet—to you I pray!
text.en-trans: gya bö rimé lamar solwa deb

text.en: Bless me that pure perception and diligence may grow!
text.en-trans: daknang tsöndrü kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: Teacher Vajrasattva of the saṃbhogakāya realm;
text.en-trans: longkü zhing du tönpa dorjé sem

text.en: Śrāvakas who listen to the Muni; Vajrapāṇi;
text.en-trans: tubpé nyentö lak na dorjé dang

text.en: Murub Tsenpo, bodhisattva in Padmasambhava’s presence;
text.en-trans: pejung drung du gyalsé mu rub tsen

text.en: Supreme Sangyé Lingpa, sovereign of profound treasures;
text.en-trans: zabter ngadak sangye lingpa chok

text.en: Re-emanated vidyādhara, Mingyur Dorjé;
text.en-trans: yangtrul rigdzin mingyur dorjé dang

text.en: Vidyādhara Chokgyur Lingpa, who holds the transmission of Guru Drakpo;
text.en-trans: gu drak kabab rigdzin chokgyur ling

text.en: And future treasure revealers Drimé Künden
text.en-trans: ma ong tertön drimé künden dang

text.en: And Sangyé Möpachen—to you I pray!
text.en-trans: sangye möpachen la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessings that all encounters be beneficial!
text.en-trans: dreltsé dön dang denpar jingyi lob

text.en: Assembly of vidyādhara gurus, grant your blessings!
text.en-trans: jingyi lob shik lama rigdzin tsok

text.en: Vidyādhara Sangyé Lingpa, dispel all obstacles!
text.en-trans: barché sol chik rigdzin sangye ling

text.en: Mighty Mingyur Dorjé, grant the siddhis!
text.en-trans: ngödrub tsol chik mingyur dorjé tsal

text.en: Vidyādhara Chokgyur Lingpa, perpetuate enlightened activity!
text.en-trans: trinlé gyé shik rigdzin chokgyur ling

text.en: Upon us, the disciples whom you embrace with care,
text.en-trans: khyé kyi jedzin bulob dakchak la

text.en: Gracious lord gurus, bestow your blessings!
text.en-trans: jingyi lob shik drinchen lama jé

text.en: Help us attain awakening within this very life!
text.en-trans: tsé chik sangye drubpar dzé du sol
